name: chicagotribune
text: Joe Biden diverged from activists pushing to “defund the police," arguing that an overhaul of policing in America can be accomplished within existing law enforcement agencies. https://t.co/kGmmh7K7sJ

name: chicagotribune
text: Calls to defund the police have rocketed to the forefront of conversations about reform in the past week. But the concept has been widely discussed in Chicago for years in the wake of scandals in the police department. https://t.co/6TH79AAovU

name: chicagotribune
text: Gov. Pritzker said his office is “looking hard” at the possibility of state licensing for police officers. But he called the rallying cry to defund the police “a poor use of words to describe what many people really want.” https://t.co/Yb81zCGGc6

name: chicagotribune
text: A throng of Cook County public defenders demonstrated outside a courthouse on Monday in support of the Black Lives Matter movement. And for many, it was personal. https://t.co/CLnOHlaquL

name: chicagotribune
text: “It is a different life being a black public defender, because these are our people every day who are ushered through those doors." https://t.co/VFAogB7l6p

name: chicagotribune
text: A crowd gathered in Pilsen Monday evening to share in good food, beautiful weather, live music and a collective call for unity. https://t.co/rk5yl5S2yD

name: chicagotribune
text: Erica Daniels is stepping down as executive director of Victory Gardens Theater. The space was a site of protests over the weekend, partly spurred by a decision to board up the theater during the response to the George Floyd killing. https://t.co/wPBjPbRxkW
